channel.title: Azure on Kamil Rithaler
channel.description: Recent content in Azure on Kamil Rithaler

item.title: Generate Azure Function GraphQL API From Database
item.description: I remember when I first used a GraphQL API in a React SPA. It was a totally different experience from the one I was used to. The flexibility and ease of API discovery with GraphiQL blew my mind. I was using and creating ODATA APIs by then and my first thought was these must be pretty much the same. In fact, the concept is similar. Give front-end developers an API that will allow them to make requests as they want, and get only the data that they want.
